subject: Attn:
body:
Attn:  
 
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your message and the content well noted, please make your choice of delivery on the Courier Companies options below and send the required courier fee to enable The Courier Company ships your ATM Visa Card to your home address without any delay because the only thing holding the delivery of your ATM Visa Card to your address right now is the delivery fee.
The process of downloading and programming your new ATM Visa CARD has been done also the amount per your withdrawal daily is $5,000 USD only until you get the total sum of $2.750,000,00 USD. This delivery has been mandated and signed to be completed within 48 hours with 100% guarantee.
Here are the delivery options:
DHL COURIER
COURIER CHARGES: $45.00
INSURANCE: $45.00
VAT:$45.00
TOTAL $135.00
INTER AFRICA COURIER
COURIER CHARGES: $50.00
INSURANCE: $90.00
VAT: $55.00
TOTAL $195.00.
FEDEX COURIER
COURIER CHARGES: $60.00
INSURANCE: $70.00
VAT: $65.00
TOTAL: $195.00.
ARAMEX COURIER
COURIER CHARGES: $50.00
INSURANCE: $55.00
VAT:$35.00
TOTAL $185.00
Here is the detail to send the fee of any of your chosen option
through Ria or Money Gram
RECEIVER`S FIRST NAME: A.
RECEIVER`S LAST NAME : B.
Receivers Surname :N.
COUNTRY : UGANDA
CITY : KAMPALA
ADDRESS...NO 2 KAMPLALA ROAD UGANDA
PHONE NUMBER +256 7559 79046
Once it's done, call me on  +256 7559 79046 or Kindly send the payment details such as the MTCN or REF NUMBER and other necessary details for easy pick up.
Note that your total fund claim has been insured to the real value and as such cannot be deducted from. The Constitutional assembly in accordance with section 13 (n) of the national gambling acts adopted this in 1993 and amended 1996.This is to protect beneficiaries and to avoid misappropriation of funds. Immediately I confirm the courier charges, I shall process your payment file and take your parcel to the Courier Company for delivery and the tracking number will be send to you to enable you know the arrival of Courier Company diplomatic agent to your home address:
Congratulations in Advance as you follow the instructions.
Yours in Services
Mr.Thomas L. Philip,

subject: Re:    Attn:
body:
Hello L. Philip,

Thank you for your detailed message. I'm excited about the prospect of receiving my ATM Visa Card! It's great to know that it's ready and just waiting for delivery.

I see there are several courier options available, which is fantastic. Could you please provide me with more information about each one? For instance, how long would delivery take with each company? Are there any additional services included in the fee, like insurance or tracking?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "the assembly in accordance with section of the national gambling acts adopted this in and ended is to protect and to avoid of funds"? I'm not quite sure I understand this part.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jessica
